sentences.en: Application: Lust and pornography are disobedient uses of our minds and eyes.

sentences.en: Grandpa switched us when we were disobedient.
sentences.cn: 不听话的时候,祖父就用鞭子抽我们.

sentences.en: He was disobedient to his mother.
Her tone was that of a parent to a disobedient child.
sentences.cn: 她的声音听上去好像家长在教训不听话的小孩。

sentences.en: His father beat hello m for being disobedient.
sentences.cn: 他爸爸因他不听话而打他.

sentences.en: I have no blessing for you while you are proud and disobedient.
sentences.cn: 如果你还是这么骄傲,不听话,我就不给你祝福.

sentences.en: I've never been tardy, absent, disobedient, slothful or disrespectful.
sentences.cn: 我从未缓慢, 缺席, 不服从, 懒惰或者不敬.

sentences.en: It grieves me to hear how disobedient you've been.
sentences.cn: 听说你很不听话,使我感到非常难过.

sentences.en: That disobedient boy is a pest.
sentences.cn: 那不听话的男孩令人讨厌.

sentences.en: The cruel captain used a scourge on his disobedient sailor.
sentences.cn: 那残忍的船长鞭打不服从命令的水手.

sentences.en: The disobedient boy was ordered out of the room.
sentences.cn: 那个不听话的孩子被赶出了房间.

sentences.en: The mischievous student has been disobedient to his mother since he was a child.
sentences.cn: 这个捣乱的学生从小就不听他母亲的话.

sentences.en: The parents punished their disobedient child.
sentences.cn: 父母惩罚了他们不听话的孩子.

sentences.en: The teacher sent the disobedient boy to the headmaster.
sentences.cn: 教师叫不服管教的孩子去见校长.
